scripts.preview: npm run build && wrangler pages dev dist --env-file .dev.vars
scripts.db:tables:local: wrangler d1 execute portfolio-db --local --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
scripts.db:tables:remote: wrangler d1 execute portfolio-db --remote --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
scripts.db:pull: wrangler d1 export portfolio-db --remote --output ./d1-export.sql && wrangler d1 execute portfolio-db --local --persist-to .wrangler/state --file ./d1-export.sql && rm ./d1-export.sql
